ownerBlockedTime: You can only book1 until {{time}} because owner has blocked from next {{mins}} mins in Seat No.{{seatNum}}

welcomeMessage: Our company provides convenient and reliable salon booking services,connecting customers with top-quality beauty parlours and professional ironing services. With our user-friendly platform,customers can easily book appointments at their favourite salons or parlours and schedule an at-home pickup and delivery ironing service, saving your time and hassle.
